Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Lionel Williams
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the price!! Real fast! No complaints here!! LOVE IT!!! Touch screen and all are fantastic! I am very happy with this product!

Reviews.Title: HP
Reviews.Author: Yasmeen A.
Reviews.Content: Very nice.Light-weight, great resolution, fast delivery, good sound, touch screen is amazing help for those new to windows 8. Overall very pleased with this as my school work lap top.

Reviews.Title: Pavilion laptop
Reviews.Author: Bruce Katchmarik
Reviews.Content: Bought this model as a replacement/upgrade for a previous HP laptop. Overall I'm satisfied with the features and performance. Windows 8 is OK but would rather have the functionality of Windows 7. Lightweight and great battery life. Webcam has poor quality resolution.

Reviews.Title: ate up
Reviews.Author: benhews
Reviews.Content: far too many product cross purposing situations.a minimum of a dozen pop ups who are in bed with HP.the "You are the 10,000 customer B,S, is just to much to take.Norton....what can you say about Norton, a parasite.It seems the computer might work o,k, after I reformat it.NO,my reformat or boot discs did not come in this computer which was sold to me as "Brand New In The Box"from "Data Master L.L.C..... through Amazon. Please get me my boot discs if you really are doing the job you say you are.

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Colvin
Reviews.Content: I have been very happy with my HP.  It has done everything I needed.  Windows 8 has not been as easy to work with as Windows XP.
